intro: Psychotria insularum, commonly known as the Island Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean islands. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments within tropical forests. Psychotria insularum is also known for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens.
